price: 82. En zij hieuwen woningen uit de rotsen (en voelden zich) veilig.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
